title: Guardiola: Sterling is incredible but still can't compare to Messi and Ronaldo – video
text:
Pep Guardiola says he is ‘delighted’ with the progress of Raheem Sterling, who has become one of the most effective strikers in the Premier League under his watch. But he hopes his forward avoids reading the praise heaped on him after impressive displays for England over the September international break.

After Gareth Southgate suggested Sterling could emulate and even overtake Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo, Guardiola warned such praise was unhelpful because ‘nobody can compare’ to the two players who have won 10 of the last 11 Ballon d’Ors between them.
